name: CATS!
description: CATS! is a CAT-based parody of some of the top video games of ALL time - Enjoy parodies inspired by Super Mario Bros®, Tetris™, Candy Crush Saga®, Nintendogs + Cats™, Sonic the Hedgehog® + more - all from a Cat's perspective! It also features a "Pet Toy"...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or Later Processor: 100 MHz or higher Memory: 128 MB RAM
